comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Markus:

The Solr Wiki is freely editable... after you create a logon. So you can add  the book to: http://wiki.apache.org/solr/SolrResources. Just create a logon and ping the user's list to be added to authors. We had a problem with spam at one point so had to add this extra step...

As far as the Apache website is concerned, I'm not quite sure, anyone?
